title: The League of Nations: the decline and fall
creator_credit: George Movshon and United Nations Television
brief_description: Describes the formation of the League of Nations shortly after the end of WWI. Also outlines related organisations such as the World Court and the International Labor Organisation. Describes the activities of Hitler, Mussilini and the Japanese invasion of China. The end of the League and the formation of the United Nations is also shown.
